snippet: Gov. Rick Perry, who will visit New York and Connecticut next week in hopes of luring business from the gun, pharmaceutical and financial industries, is spreading his recruitment message on the radio and television.
abstract: Gov. Rick Perry, who will visit New York and Connecticut next week in hopes of luring business from the gun, pharmaceutical and financial industries, is spreading his recruitment message on the radio and television.

headline.main: Texas Comes North to Poach Business
